description: This source file provides utility functions to extract and format version information from a given data structure (likely a dictionary). It includes functions to get a version as a list of integers and as a string, based on the 'version' key in the input.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version from an info dictionary, supporting either a list or string format, and defaults missing components to '1.0.0'.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by utilizing GetVersion.
